verbose_text: In addition, overexpression of an Arp2/3 binding WCA (WH2, central, and acidic) domain of Scar1 (NPF), which leads to cytoplasmic sequestration and inhibition of the Arp2/3 complex, and therefore inhibition of motility of Listeria, Shigella, and Rickettsia conorii, had no effect on actin based motility of B. pseudomallei.
